title: Spell vamp
body: Correct me if im wrong, but other than the 2% from the mastery, spell vamp no longer exists does it? Removed all items with spellvamp and you removed akali's spellvamp passive, so whats the point in having spellvamp as a shown stat anymore, just replace it with your Damage heal or omnivamp or whatever it is you call it now, and change the mastery from 2% lifesteal and spellvamp to 2% omnivamp. It cleans up the useless stat, makes the mastery shorter, and it allows people with gunblade and whatever that other item is to see their healing from the omnivamp. What's the point in showing a stat that virtually doesnt exist anymore?

replies.body: Morgana still has Spell Vamp passive.

Here are all the spell vamps i know off. Lee Sin has spell vamp, Akali still does have spell vamp, Spell vamp Quints and masteries still exist. Gundblade still heals you base on the amount of damage you do (Still technically spell vamp), Vladimir is basically a spell vamp champion. I think that's it

no not technically spell vamp, spell vamp doesnt heal on autoattacks does it. Spell vamp despite its name doesnt heal from ignite, omnivamp does. Omnivamp is everywhere in the game, spell vamp only has 3 or 4 instances in the game, which could easily be replaced with omnivamp seeing as most of them come with a life steal additive of the same value.
